headline: GE Aerospace Board of Directors Authorizes Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of GE Aerospace (NYSE: GE) today declared a $0.47 per share dividend on the outstanding common stock of the Company. The dividend is payable April 27, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 9, 2026. The ex-dividend date is March 9, 2026.

headline: Boeing, IBD Stock Of The Day, Back In Buy Zone On India, Saudi Arabia Deal Buzz
summary: Stock Of The Day: Boeing may get big orders for Saudi Arabia and India as its turnaround gains steam. Boeing stock reclaimed a buy zone.

headline: Here is What to Know Beyond Why GE Aerospace (GE) is a Trending Stock
summary: GE (GE) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.

headline: Big Tech to Spend $650 Billion This Year as AI Race Intensifies
summary: The spending planned by Alphabet Inc., Amazon.com Inc., Meta Platforms Inc. and Microsoft Corp., all in pursuit of dominance in the still-nascent market for AI tools, is a boom without a parallel this century.  Each of the companies’ estimated outlay for this year would set a high-water mark for capital spending by any single corporation in any one of the past 10 years, according to Bloomberg data.
